title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Deep Geothermal
purpose: The APPG is for parliamentarians to share information and ideas, and to work collaboratively with stakeholders to develop a new British growth industry that is key to energy security and net zero, with the long-term goal of becoming a mainstream renewable energy source in the UK.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 0207 219 5260.
contact_details.public_enquiry_point_name: Association for Renewable Energy and Clean Technology (REA). Tel: 020 7925 3570
contact_details.secretariat: Association for Renewable Energy and Clean Technology (REA) acts as the group's secretariat.https://www.r-e-a.net/

detailed_benefits.Source: Association for Renewable Energy and Clean Technology (REA)
detailed_benefits.Description: Association for Renewable Energy and Clean Technology (REA) is paid by the following to act as the group's secretariat: Angus Energy Plc, GT Energy Uk Limited, Schlumberger Oilfield UK Limited, Consortium Drilling Limited, IGAS Energy Plc, Nov Uk Holdings Limited, Rees Onshore Seismic Ltd, Weatherford U.K. Limited, Yellowstone Environmental Solutions Ltd, Eden Geothermal Ltd, Townrock Energy, Sproule (Veegeo), MWEM Services, Geothermal Engineering Limited,  EGS Energy Limited, Chubb From : 05/09/2024 To  : 04/09/2025
